name: Cell Fighter
description:
This is second Tic-80 project, Cell Fighter.

This game is inspired by many Dogfighting / bombing games including Time pilot, Sopwith, Two Tigers, and Scramble.

Your main Objective is Carpet bombing enemies at ground and ceiling while dogfighting with enemy aircrafts.

Every 3th levels have narrow space, and every 6th levels are dogfighting level where your objective is eliminating enemy fighters and giant sphere.

you get a bonus life at every 25000 points.

Items -
S : bonus shield
B : Additional Bomb
N : Napalm bomb
C : Cluster bomb

Controls -
B or Y : Fire gun
A or X : Drop bombs
